reviews.review_text:
Brilliant little restaurant tucked away near the shores of Utorda.

We arrived as soon as they opened for their evening service. We were a party of 6 adults and 2 children. Greeted by a lovely gentleman, who sat us down and joined two tables together to accommodate us.

The service and atmosphere was great. The waiter always tentative to our request. The venue is nice and quiet, just a few minutes walk inland, from the beach.

The food was delicious with big portions, having us all leaving stuffed and satisfied. Prices were a tiny bit lower here compared to the other places in this area (as you would expect being near the beach) but well worth it.

We will definitely return.

This place deserves a visit by all! Run by a Goan family, this cute restaurant serves the best food. Be it a Goan beef chilli or their special chilli squids or  tandoor pork ribs.. they do it all with ease .. and leave you wanting more.
Every item we ate - the chicken lollipops, the kerala style meat xacuti, the salt and pepper tongue .. ðŸ¤¯ all of it were just lip-smacking. This is truly a place that you're gonna keep going back to.

The overall taste & experience at Cajyâ€™s Multicuisine restaurant & bar was exceptional.  We were 11 of us. Each dish was well-seasoned, fresh, and served at the right temperature. The unique flavors and culinary techniques used in their preparation were impressive, making it a memorable dining experience.
The lighting is warm and ambient, creating a relaxed dining environment. The seating arrangement is comfortable, and the overall theme of the restaurant is stylish and contemporary.
The service was excellent, with friendly and attentive staff. They were knowledgeable about the menu and provided timely and efficient service throughout the meal.
They  offer a fantastic dining experience with its delicious food and excellent service. The unique flavors and quality of the dishes make it a standout choice. All of it tasted fresh and flavorful. Service was quick. Definitely worth adding to the must visit list while in goa.
Highly recommended for a memorable experience.
